description:
Performance improvement is possible by caching the values from the global CONF object that are repeatedly access, including CONF.scheduler_default_filters and CONF.scheduler_default_filters (see patch here: https://review.openstack.org/#/c/85594/3/nova/scheduler/host_manager.py) and CONF.scheduler_weight_classes.

Avoiding CONF lookups where possible is just good practice.
title: nova.scheduler.host_manager should cache CONF values
